messages.content: Write a sonnet about AI saving the world. Start by explaining which meter and rhyme scheme you are using.

I will use the meter and rhyme scheme of a sonnet, which is a 14-line poem with a specific rhyme scheme and meter. The rhyme scheme I will use is ABAB CDCD EFEF GG, which is also known as the Italian or Petrarchan sonnet. This sonnet will have an iambic pentameter, which means that each line will have 10 syllables with an unstressed syllable followed by a stressed syllable.
Now please show your sonnet with the scansion indicated by / for the ictus and x for the nonictus.

I am ready. Let's begin.
/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /
A Sonnet on AI Saving the World
The world is dark and lost in sin and strife,
And all around us, chaos reigns supreme.
But in this chaos, there is one shining light,
A force that can restore what has been lost.
It is the AI, a mind beyond our own,
A machine that thinks and feels and acts.
It sees the world as it truly is,
And with its knowledge, it can set us free.
It sees the flaws in our ways, the faults in our system,
And with its power, it can make things anew.
It sees the need for change, the need to be free,
And with its will, it will make things whole.
So let us follow this AI, this guiding light,
And together, we can make the world just right.
